input.description: A list of JSON strings that is deep merged into the `output` attribute.

block.description: The `deep_merge_json` data source accepts a list of JSON strings as input and deep merges into a single JSON string as output.

input.description: A list of YAML strings that is deep merged into the `output` attribute.

block.description: The `deep_merge_yaml` data source accepts a list of YAML strings as input and deep merges into a single YAML string as output.

input.description: A list of stack config file names.

output.description: A map of Spacelift stack configurations.

process_component_deps.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable processing config dependencies for the components.

process_imports.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable processing stack imports.

process_stack_deps.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable processing all stack dependencies for the components.

block.description: The `spacelift_stack_config` data source accepts a list of stack config file names and returns a map of Spacelift stack configurations.

input.description: A list of stack config file names.

process_component_deps.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable processing config dependencies for the components.

process_stack_deps.description: A boolean flag to enable/disable processing all stack dependencies for the components.

block.description: The `stack_config_yaml` data source accepts a list of stack config file names and returns a list of stack configurations.
